reminder_message: Schedule your free appointment with us!
side_detective_1: You have trouble in business, criminal, civic or divorce cases?
side_detective_2: You suspect your loved one has an affair?
side_debt_collection_1: Your debtor fails to pay as promised?
side_business_intelligence_1: You need data on your contractor or competitor?
side_business_protection_1: Your company's secrets got into wrong hands?
side_business_protection_2: You think you might be spied on?
side_workshops_1: You want to be aware of threats in a hostile business environment?
contact_form_caption: In Jaran we always have time for our customers. Leave us a message including your name and e-mail address. Describe your case and how you would expect us to help you. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_caption: Our office is located roughly 400 meters from the Palace of Culture and Science in Warsaw. You are welcome to visit us at Pozna≈Ñska Street or another location prefered by you.
